content: Multitool metal plunge cut blade (carbide) Carbide metal plunge cutting blade for the oscillating multitool, for plunge cuts in metal and stainless steel ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Multi-tool inserts- ### FEATURES:Features Increased versatility – quickly swap out plunge cut blade attachments to cover a wide range of base materials and applications More sustainable - adapt the Hilti SMT-6 multitool for different applications and base materials by switching inserts, without stocking multiple tools More flexibility – Starlock interface is compatible with all Starlock multitools on the market Easier to change inserts - Starlock compatible interface for a safer and more convenient tool-free insert change Applications Carbide segmented blade for plunge cuts and cut-outs in metal and stainless steel Expand the range of applications possible with the Hilti multitool ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2368503 - Plunge cut blade SMT S+ carbide tipp. - Package Size 1 pc - 3867282 - Plunge Cut Blade Carbide (3-Pack) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 3x Plunge cut blade SMT S+ carbide tipp.
